name: THE BROKEN TIME MACHINE
description:
You've built a broken time machine and now you're stuck in a 60 second time loop! Down in your secret lab, located underneath the house that's bigger on the inside than it is on the outside, there is a button to stop it. Get to the button and press it to end this nightmare.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Interact: E
  • Mute Music: M

Credits:

Here's a list of assets I've used

  1. https://jestan.itch.io/pixel-texture-pack
  2. https://bitvillain.itch.io/assorted-pixel-icons (the key sprite)
